level.text: An applicant or recipient who is aggrieved by a decision of CFSA in connection with the denial, reduction, or termination of a permanent guardianship subsidy, including a failure to act on a request for review pursuant to ยง 6105.1(d), may appeal the decision in accordance 29 DCMR Chapter 59.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 48 DCR 3671 (April 27, 2001) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 48 DCR 10740 (November 23, 2001).
